name: Shashwat Foundation Trust
briefDescription: To establish Deemed University, further establish institutions in various academics independently and/or in collaboration with or in joint venture or through tie-ups with other Institutions, Universities, Educational Entities and Governments in India for furtherance of education and learning.To establish, run take over and/or maintain dispensarys, hospitals, medical centers, medical colleges and any other healthcenter for providing health education and treatment.To help needy, suffering, sick, and handicapped in recovery and rehabilitation.
